entry.title: $2550 // Beautiful new 3bed with laundry in the building steps from JMZ!!!!
entry.content:
Now Offering 2 months Free + No Brokers Fee!

Beautifully renovated No fee True 3 bedroom just steps from the JMZ trains at Myrtle-Broadway making your commute a breeze!

Apartment Features:
- No Fee
- Newly Renovated
- Large True 3 Bedrooms with closets & windows in each room!
- Smart Apartment- Control temperature with NEST Thermostat
- High Ceilings
- Large Windows
- Hardwood Floors
- Full sized Stainless Steel appliances including Dishwasher & Microwave
- Large laundry room in the building
- Bike Storage
- Parking available

Conveniently located where Bed-Stuy meets Bushwick, you will find yourself surrounded by locally-owned restaurants, cafes,boutiques, and supermarkets!

Only a few blocks from the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 10 minutes into the city!!!

Flexible lease terms available!

The price is net effective with one month free on a 12 month lease. Gross rent is $2,800.
